description: A fire broke out at a heat transfer unit in Russia's Novoshakhtinsk oil refinery, located in the southern Rostov region, on Wednesday morning, the local emergency service reported.
title: Fire broke out at Russia's Novoshakhtinsk oil refinery - Reuters
content: MOSCOW, June 22 (Reuters) - A fire broke out at a heat transfer unit in Russia's Novoshakhtinsk oil refinery, located in the southern Rostov region, on Wednesday morning, the local emergency service … [+333 chars]

description: Oil prices wobbled early on Monday as investors refocused on tight supplies, though sentiment was still fragile after 6% slump in the previous session amid concerns about slowing global economic growth and fuel demand.

description: Most stock markets in the Gulf ended higher on Tuesday, tracking oil prices and global shares as China eased some quarantine requirements for international arrivals which raised hopes for stronger growth and a revival in demand for commodities.

description: OPEC's oil revenue surged in 2021 as prices and demand recovered from the worst of the COVID pandemic, while the number of its members' active rigs posted a modest rebound and new completed wells declined, data from the group showed.
title: OPEC boosts oil income in 2021, well completions drop - Reuters.com
